long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No need to think of boring descriptions and tags anymore.
This tool automates the process of filling in details that are needed to submit sound effects on Audio Jungle. 
-Description and Tags are generated automatically by harnessing the power of ChatGPT.
-Audio Duration, Type, and other checkboxes are automatically filled out.

*This tool currently doesn't upload the file. You should do this manually, and choose the files from the drop-down menus.

**Currently works best with single sample uploads. If you upload a bundle, you'll need to fill in the list by yourself in the description, but you can still use the extension to generate the tags and an awesome description. You can do this by simply choosing one of the files with the "select file" button.
